abstract: Stefanus Johannes "Stijn" Schaars (Dutch pronunciation: [ˈstɛin ˈsxaːrs]; born on 11 January 1984 in Gendt, Gelderland) is a Dutch footballer who currently plays in the Eredivisie for PSV and the Netherlands national team as a midfielder.
comment: Stefanus Johannes "Stijn" Schaars (Dutch pronunciation: [ˈstɛin ˈsxaːrs]; born on 11 January 1984 in Gendt, Gelderland) is a Dutch footballer who currently plays in the Eredivisie for PSV and the Netherlands national team as a midfielder.
